definition: drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell
drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell
full and bulging (of a pocket, pouch etc)

sentences.english: He released his hand and sat down in the chair, fuming.
sentences.chinese: 他一把放手，氣鼓鼓坐在那張椅子裏。

sentences.english: Before being fermented, the white chunks of tofu are plump and pliant . How filling they look!
sentences.chinese: 泡製前的豆腐塊白鼓鼓的，富彈性，很有飽實感。

sentences.english: His bag was bulging with presents.
sentences.chinese: 她的袋子由於裝了禮物而脹得鼓鼓的。

sentences.english: Next up is the bulging pencil case.
sentences.chinese: 下一步就是鼓鼓囊囊的鉛筆盒。

sentences.english: He merely stood and watched his father while clapping politely.
sentences.chinese: 他只是站在那裏看着他的父親，禮貌性地鼓鼓掌。

sentences.english: Puffy, plasticky packages of Doggie Depends stocked in the pantry.
sentences.chinese: 櫥櫃堆滿鼓鼓的塑料包裝狗尿布。

sentences.english: My files now bulge with more than 800 rejections.
sentences.chinese: 如今，我的文件夾被八百餘封拒信塞得鼓鼓囊囊。

sentences.english: "Engines are much faster than buses, " huffed Thomas.
sentences.chinese: “火車當然比巴士快很多了”托馬斯氣鼓鼓的說。

sentences.english: and the sight of everyone carrying bags bulging with food.
sentences.chinese: 以及人人手裏大包小包拎着鼓鼓囊囊食品袋的景象。

sentences.english: Jolly him up and get the job done.
sentences.chinese: 給他鼓鼓勁兒，把工作做完。

sentences.english: His pocket was bulging with apples.
sentences.chinese: 他的口袋裏鼓鼓地裝滿了蘋果。

sentences.english: His pockets bulged with apples and candy.
sentences.chinese: 他的口袋鼓鼓地裝滿了蘋果和糖。

sentences.english: A dozen petticoats bulked out her figure.
sentences.chinese: 十幾條襯裙把她的身體撐得圓鼓鼓的。

sentences.english: The wind rounded out the sails as the little boat rushed along.
sentences.chinese: 小船駛得飛快，風將船帆吹得鼓鼓的。

sentences.english: She carried a filled canvas satchel.
sentences.chinese: 她帶了一個鼓鼓囊囊的帆布包。

definition: full and bulging (of a pocket, pouch etc)
embroidered pouch for carrying loose change etc/purse/pocket (in clothing)
to summon one's (courage, faith etc)/to puff up (one's cheeks etc)/to bulge/to swell out
variant of 紅彤彤|红彤彤[hong2 tong1 tong1]
